snippet: For both the state and national polls to be accurate, and the math to work, something needs to give.
abstract: Nate Silver FiveThirtyEight blog examines discrepancy between national polls, which suggest tie in presidential race, and state polls suggesting a lead for Pres Obama in the Electoral College.
lead_paragraph: For both the state and national polls to be accurate, and the math to work, something needs to give.

headline.main: When State Polls Differ From National Polls
headline.print_headline: When State Polls Differ From National Polls
